Avior Marine Inc specializes in providing Filipino Officers & Crew. Through our affiliated Company Avior Marine Crewing NV we can offer total crew management solutions covering multiple nationalities and lumps sum contracts. For more information contact : info@aviormarine.com

 

Our Basic Service

  • Selection & Recruitment
  • Processing seafarers for dispatch (contracting, medical, visa’s)
  • Payment of allotments (min 80% of basic wage should be paid in the Philippines)
  • Pool management (rotation planning, promotions, evaluations)
  • Advise on market conditions (Terms & Conditions, Unions)

 

 Additional services

  • Travel
  • Managing Companies Training requirement
  • Cadet development program
  • On Board payroll
  • Outsourcing Aministrative Work
  • P&I case management
